DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENERGY
DOC.TEXT: Texaco ' s 1st Quarter Earnings Up 8.3 % : In the final three months of 1993 , Texaco ' s earnings rose to $ 339 million , or $ 1.21 per share , on sales of $ 8.58 billion.A year earlier , the company earned $ 313 million , or $ 1.11 per share , on sales of $ 9.48 billion . Crude_oil prices averaged $ 4 per barrel lower in the quarter , helping cut earnings from exploration and production by 54 % . But earnings from refining and marketing more_than doubled from $ 83 million to $ 220 million . Natural_gas prices were slightly below year-ago levels .
